system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.jViibXrHmQKko0gM]{Basic Defensive Form}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.IqlAGgpvfpZnCc2W]{Reaction Form Focus} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.gAJy77Uf1u1MAm8m]{Deflect Form Focus}

Benefits

When attempting the Deflect Reaction, the character receives a +4 to their Reflex Saving Throw, and the character gains a +4 bonus to disarm when wielding a psiblade or plasblade. Also, when attempting a Parry reaction against a target with a psiblade or plasblade, the character gains an additional +4 to their DEF increase from the parry, on a successful parry, when wielding a psiblade or plasblade. This increase lasts as long as the original bonus from successfully parrying against a target.
system.summary: +4 to deflect reactions, disarming and DEF after a parry
